Uses of Package
org.codehaus.jackson.schema

  • Packages that use org.codehaus.jackson.schema 
    Package Description
    org.codehaus.jackson.map
    Contains basic mapper (conversion) functionality that allows for converting between regular streaming json content and Java objects (beans or Tree Model: support for both is via ObjectMapper class, as well as convenience methods included in JsonParser
    org.codehaus.jackson.map.ext
    Contains extended support for "external" packages: things that may or may not be present in runtime environment, but that are commonly enough used so that explicit support can be added.
    org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser
    Contains implementation classes of serialization part of data binding.
    org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser.impl
    Contains implementation classes of serialization part of data binding.
    org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser.std  
    org.codehaus.jackson.xc
    Package that contains XML Compatibility functionality for Jackson, such as handlers for JAXB annotations
  • Classes in org.codehaus.jackson.schema used by org.codehaus.jackson.map 
    Class and Description
    JsonSchema
    A JsonNode that represents a JSON-Schema instance.
  • Classes in org.codehaus.jackson.schema used by org.codehaus.jackson.map.ext 
    Class and Description
    SchemaAware
    Marker interface for schema-aware serializers.
  • Classes in org.codehaus.jackson.schema used by org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser 
    Class and Description
    JsonSchema
    A JsonNode that represents a JSON-Schema instance.
    SchemaAware
    Marker interface for schema-aware serializers.
  • Classes in org.codehaus.jackson.schema used by org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser.impl 
    Class and Description
    SchemaAware
    Marker interface for schema-aware serializers.
  • Classes in org.codehaus.jackson.schema used by org.codehaus.jackson.map.ser.std 
    Class and Description
    SchemaAware
    Marker interface for schema-aware serializers.
  • Classes in org.codehaus.jackson.schema used by org.codehaus.jackson.xc 
    Class and Description
    SchemaAware
    Marker interface for schema-aware serializers.
